about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

The Secret Story is a first-person adventure game that combines immersive storytelling with mysterious events from around the world.

The Secret Story is a storytelling game that explores beliefs often at odds with human logic and reasoning. Players will experience real-life stories and events tied to various beliefs around the world, presented through the game's narrative.

You will experience sound , sights, tastes, smells, and sounds as if you were truly there. Along the way, you will make critical decisions that determine your fate—leading either to survival or a deadly end through the game's choice-based system!

Every choice the player makes is primarily based on either belief or reason. The game’s narrative will shift depending on each decision made.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Secret Story Chapter 1 – XIII Phobia

This chapter delves into the story of the number 13, considered a lucky number in Western beliefs. However, on the other side of the world, 13 is associated with misfortune. Players will step into the shoes of the protagonist, who encounters strange and mysterious events. Every decision is yours to make—whether to trust belief or rely on reason to survive.

Game Key Features

  • Realistic graphics and environmental immersive visual experience.

  • Immersive first-person perspective (FPS).

  • Engage in interactions and participate in activities that simulate real-life experiences.

  • Interact with NPCs to explore deeper connections.

  • A deeply psychological experience that will keep you questioning everything.

  • Various puzzles and riddles

Game Key Features Coming Soon - Extended Edition

  • Overcome the game through diverse choices.

  • Multiple endings await, depending on whether you choose to believe in the story or not.

  • Minigame and more Various puzzles and riddles.

short_description: The Secret Story is a game that tells mysterious and horror-filled stories through an FPV. The game is designed with a focus on realism, allowing players to immerse themselves in the atmosphere, visuals, scents, and sounds, as if they were truly experiencing the culture tied to those beliefs.
